com.clarkparsia.common.hash
Class AbstractHasher

java.lang.Object
  com.clarkparsia.common.hash.AbstractHasher
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.common.hash.Hasher, com.google.common.hash.PrimitiveSink
public abstract class AbstractHasher
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.common.hash.Hasher

An abstract Hasher implementation derived from the Guava AbstractHasher, which is packaged private, while this is public making it accessible for all implementors.

Since:
2.3
Version:
2.3
Author:
Michael Grove
